snippet.title: Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
Get another look at Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot in this new gameplay trailer for the upcoming rogue-lite shooter game. Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot will be available on Xbox Series X?S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam in 2023.

Slime 3k stars a big blob of jelly and hatred on the warpath. In an attempt to mass produce artificial pink humans, evil artificial intelligence d’Spot’s gooey formula accidentally mutates, becoming self-aware. Humans, robots, and monsters pounce on you in an endless stream. Luckily, you can grow and develop new weapons to transform everything into mincemeat like a giant gelatinous meat grinder.
